deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Emitted when ownership of the contract's transferred.
@dev Throws if an implementation's preset for this contract.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
@dev Throws if address passed is not a valid one.

@dev Sets the address of initial implementation, and the contract's deployer as the 
 initial owner of the contract.

@dev Upgrades the beacon to a new implementation.
 Requirements:
 - tx.origin must be owner of the contract.
 - `_newEscrowImplAddress` must be a contract.

BeaconOwnershipTransferred(address,addre.details: Emitted when ownership of the contract's transferred.

initializer(address).details: Sets the address of initial implementation, and the contract's deployer as the  initial owner of the contract.

transferBeaconOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`_newBeaconOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner. Emits an {OwnershipTransferred} event.

update(address).details: Upgrades the beacon to a new implementation. Requirements: - tx.origin must be owner of the contract. - `_newEscrowImplAddress` must be a contract.
